alert.note: Alert for Brown; Greene; Johnson; Monroe; Morgan; Owen; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Shelby, northern Monroe, southern Morgan, Johnson, northwestern Brown, southeastern Owen and northeastern Greene Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Greenwood to 7 miles southwest of Spencer. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Greenwood and Franklin around 420 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bloomington and Shelbyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 86 and 97. Interstate 74 between mile markers 106 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central, central, southwestern and west central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Greene; Johnson; Monroe; Morgan; Owen; Shelby
